main event: A bright white light was observed moving from north to south, changing color to red as it sank into the sun's rays.
interesting points: The light appeared larger than a planet.
The light was in constant sight, but the length of the sighting is unknown.
The reporting aircraft was flying at 17,222 feet at 37 degrees North, 142 degrees 43 minutes West.
An unconfirmed report indicates that a Northwest Airlines aircraft also reported sighting the light, but no further information or aircraft numbers were available.
result: insufficient data for evaluation or conclusion
